# Eagle Eye Construction Estimating System - Project Setup

## Project Overview
Full-stack construction estimating system integrating STACK/Buildxact, Microsoft 365 Excel workflows, AI-powered cost estimation, green materials database, investor dashboard, and Unykorn vault/tokenization.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md created
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [ ] Scaffold the Project
- [ ] Customize the Project
- [ ] Install Required Extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project
- [ ] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend**: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + TailwindCSS
- **Backend**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- **Excel Integration**: ExcelJS for .xlsx export
- **AI**: OpenAI API for cost predictions
- **Auth**: JWT-based authentication
- **File Storage**: Local + Azure Blob Storage support

## Key Features
1. Project & estimate management
2. Materials database (standard + green/solar components)
3. STACK/Buildxact import/export
4. AI cost prediction engine
5. Excel template generation
6. Investor dashboard with analytics
7. Vault/tokenization integration APIs
8. Power BI data export

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow REST API conventions
- Implement proper error handling
- Write clear API documentation
- Use environment variables for config
- Follow React best practices
